description:
Join me as I dive into the latest MSFS 2020 addon for Brownsville/South Padre Island International Airport (KBRO), released today! Discover the stunning details, hand-crafted textures, and dynamic lighting that bring this airport to life. Perfect for both leisure and business flights, this addon is a must-have for any flight sim enthusiast. Donâ€™t miss out on this exciting review!

Brownsville/South Padre Island International Airport is located 5 mi (4.3 nmi; 8.0 km) east of downtown Brownsville, Cameron County, in the U.S. state of Texas.

The Brownsville/South Padre Island International Airport serves three airlines, six air taxis and offers two fixed-base operations (FBOs) for general aviation. The National Plan of Integrated Airport Systems for 2011â€“2015 categorized it as a primary commercial service facility.

For a full overview of new airports and scenery added to the marketplace this week have a look at the video below:
